ruler: Lathon Halpum (wants to unite Talenta Plains and become a great nation), Holy Uldra (a powerful shaman that wants to rid Talenta Plains of outsiders)
characteristics: The people are simple, wild, and clan-based
Halflings form a spiritual bond with their dinosaurs
lastWarSynopsis: The halfling tribes joined together to defend themselves from outsiders, and the Talenta Plains were recognized as a nation under the Treaty of Thronehold
The natives of the Plains have no interest in change, but more foreigners visit the Plains than at any time in the past
